                                   java.lang.String color,
                                   int decoTime,
                                   java.lang.String tip)
        Adds a residue of class Inert
        pre: At least one product must created and must no null.
        Parameters:
        name - , String Residue name.
        productId - , product id of the product that produced the residue.
        id - , String id of the residue.
        origin - , String origin of the residue.
        color - , String color of the residue.
        decoTime - , int decomposition time of the residue in days.
        tip - , String recomendation to dispose of the residue. pos: Object of class Inert is created.
        Returns:
        Message of success or null String if the object could not be created.

      • addResidue

        public java.lang.String addResidue​(java.lang.String name,

                                   java.lang.String origin,
                                   java.lang.String color,
                                   int decoTime,
                                   java.lang.String type,
                                   java.lang.String description)
        Creates a new Recyclable residue for a given product
        pre: At least one product must created and must be no null.
        Parameters:
        name - , String - Residue name.
        productId - , productId, product id of the product that produced the residue.
        id - , String id of the residue.
        origin - , String origin of the residue.
        color - , String color of the residue.
        decoTime - , int decomposition time of the residue in days.
        type - , String recyclable residue type.
        description - , String description of the recyclable residue. pos: New recyclable residue is created.
        Returns:
        Message of success or null String if the object could not be created.

      • addResidue

        public java.lang.String addResidue​(java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String productId,
                                   java.lang.String id,
                                   java.lang.String origin,
                                   java.lang.String color,
                                   int decoTime,
                                   boolean canCompost)
        Creates new Biodegradable residue for a given product.
        pre: At least one product must created and must be no null.
        Parameters:
        name - , String - Residue name.
        productId - , id of the product that which contain the residue.
        id - , String id of the residue.
        origin - , String origin of the residue.
        color - , String color of the residue.
        decoTime - , int decomposition time of the residue in days.
        canCompost - , boolean true or false depending in if a the biodegrdable residue is compostable or not. pos: New biodegradable residue is created.
        Returns:
        Message of success or null String if the object could not be created.
